entries: You earned a living wrenching precious minerals from the lightless depths of the earth. Adventuring might have seemed lucrative or glamorous compared to this backbreaking laborâ€”and if you have to head back underground, this time you plan to do so armed with a real weapon instead of a miner's pick.

You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and the {@skill Lore||Mining Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Terrain Expertise} skill feat with underground terrain.
